 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפִיפֹן‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==horned snake==, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">κεράστης</span> (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.49.17|Gen 49:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָחָשׁ‎</span>); = ***cerastes cornutus*** or ***Hasselquistii***, compare [[BDB#Tristr|Tr]]<sup>NBB 273</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hast. DB iv. 457 f.</sup> McLean-Shipley<sup>Ency. Bib. iv. 4393</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>on the passage</sup> — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוּפָם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוּפָן‎</span> see S. V.
